So basically you have to have jailbreaked ipad to run this?

LAME! How about posting some apps that dont need you to jailbreak your ipad. Seriously dude, not busting your balls but theres alot of people who dont want to run the risk of bricking a $500-$1000 device, or even loose the hundreds of dollars of apps/games already purchased. Well i guess you dont loose then cause you can back it up before jailbreaking then just restore later on with all your paid apps if it doesnt work, but still. It would be nice to have apps put up here that are just normal. if thats even possible.

@LukeScooto MATE U R RIGHT. I M NOT OFFENDED BY WHAT U SAID. BUT HOW CAN U PLAY PAID APPS IN A "NON JAILBROKEN DEVICE" AND IN OTHER CASE IF U WANT TO PLAY, THAN U CAN DOWNLOAD FREE VERSIONS FROM APP STORE.
AND BELIEVE ME JAILBREAKING IS NOT RISKY. ITS A 10SEC PROCESS.
Nice torrent, surely because it's over 100 mb and the internet on my iPad is really slow. It takes over 2 hours at least to download this on it..
